<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone">

        <child display_value="My Hello World 1">3ded70c193da6250c7667a5efaba10d4</child>

        <payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category/><client_script><![CDATA[function() {	
	var c = this;		
  c.display = function() {		
		c.data.message = (c.data.sometext) ? 'Hello ' + c.data.sometext + '!' : '';
	}
	
	c.display();
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>h1 {
color: #428bca;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data>{
	"data": {
		"sometext": "world"
	}
}</demo_data><description/><docs display_value="Widgets">948bab53d721120023c84f80de61034e</docs><field_list/><has_preview>true</has_preview><id>hello-world</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Hello World 1</name><option_schema/><public>true</public><roles/><script/><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-02-08 21:36:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>6f2cff80d721120023c84f80de61033c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>181</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hello World 1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">627973aa5cc022105590c762d23e6304</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_6f2cff80d721120023c84f80de61033c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-03-02 00:15:45</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div>
 Enter your name:
 <input type="text" ng-model="c.data.sometext" ng-change="c.display()"/>
 <h1>{{ c.data.message }}</h1>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload>
